ProsperityLionPayoutAndRulesShared.BodyBallFeature1: Two Ball symbols appearing anywhere on reels 2 and 4 will trigger the Ball Feature.
ProsperityLionPayoutAndRulesShared.BodyBallFeature2: Two festive balls will appear and a festive ball will be randomly chosen to award either 2 or 5 times of the current bet amount.
ProsperityLionPayoutAndRulesShared.BodyLionFeature1: Two Lion symbols appearing anywhere on reels 2 and 4 will trigger the Lion Feature.
ProsperityLionPayoutAndRulesShared.BodyLionFeature2: Two lion heads will appear and a lion head will be randomly chosen to award either 5 or 10 times of the current bet amount.
ProsperityLionPayoutAndRulesShared.BodyLionDanceFeature1: A Lion symbol and a Ball symbol appearing anywhere on reels 2 and 4 respectively (or reels 4 and 2 respectively) will trigger the Lion Dance Feature.
ProsperityLionPayoutAndRulesShared.BodyLionDanceFeature2: A lion will appear and randomly travel within reels 2, 3 and 4 from the Lion symbol's position to the Ball symbol's position.
ProsperityLionPayoutAndRulesShared.BodyLionDanceFeature3: Any symbols on reels 2, 3 and 4 that the Lion travelled on (including the Lion symbol and the Ball symbol) will be transformed into Wild symbols.
ProsperityLionPayoutAndRulesShared.BodyLionDanceFeature4: When the lion reaches the Ball symbol's position, the lion is removed and wins will then be paid.
ProsperityLionPayoutAndRulesShared.GeneralRulesPayoutValue1: Wild symbol substitutes for all symbols except Lion symbol and Ball symbol.
ProsperityLionPayoutAndRulesShared.GeneralRulesPayoutValue2: Wild symbol appears on reels 2, 3 and 4 only.
ProsperityLionPayoutAndRulesShared.GeneralRulesPayoutValue3: Lion symbol and Ball symbol appear on reels 2 and 4 only.

ProsperityLionRules.GeneralRules1: Prosperity Lion is a 5-reel, 3-row video slot featuring Lion symbol and Ball symbol that award various features on the reels.

GeneralRules2.value: The game is played with 9 bet lines (fixed), bet level of %{minBetMtp} to %{maxBetMtp} and bet size of %{minChip} to %{maxChip}.
GeneralRules2.comment: %{minBetMtp}, %{maxBetMtp}, %{minChip}, %{maxChip} will be minimum bet level, maximum max level, minimum bet size and maximum bet size in numeric form.
GeneralRules2.example: The game is played with 30 bet lines (fixed), bet level of 1 to 10 and bet size of 0.05 to 50.
